dataList.content: The branch facility we entered was not as well-preserved as the one we had visited in District 4.
It seems N Corp’s Inquisitors have been using this place as their base for a while; various torture devices and bits of flesh and machinery like those we saw in town came into my sight.

dataList.title: Kalf Townsfolk
dataList.content: Please stop… It hurts… It hurts so much…!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Hah. This one speaks of suffering.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: It must be a false cry. Pay it no mind.

dataList.title: Kalf Townsfolk
dataList.content: No… The pain… It’s real, I swear…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Did it not hurt to attach these impurities to your flesh? Did your conscience not scream as you rejected your humanity?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Enough. This one is too far gone to repent.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Does the absence of tears not say enough? This one is only pretending to confess.

dataList.title: Kalf Townsfolk
dataList.content: No, wait! I can… I can shed tears! So I beg you, please…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: We can afford to verify, can we not?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: …Hm. Indeed, for a genuine effusion of sorrow suggests humanity.

dataList.title: Kalf Townsfolk
dataList.content: Thank you… Thank you so much…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Now, we shall lift your eye.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Their heretical depravity knows no bounds; they’ve gone so far as to make vile devices that mimic tear glands. We must see with our own true eyes that this isn’t the case.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: We will let you go if we can confirm that your eye socket is indeed of flesh and blood.

dataList.title: Kalf Townsfolk
dataList.content: Wha… No—stop!!!
…Huzzah!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Gah… Ngh…
털썩

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: …You heretics truly are like pests.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Never alone, with a habit of constantly obstructing our great task; you are kindred creatures indeed.
Rodya shrugged when I looked back.
What? I wanted to take charge for once.
